name: Obsidian Beast - Artemis
text: FLIP: Target 1 Flip monster in your GY; add that target to your hand or Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Set monster you control; flip it face-up, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You can only use 1 effect of "Obsidian Beast - Artemis" per turn and only once that turn.
